name: Total Recall (2012)
summary: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Recall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.
info:
• 中文名: 全面回忆 (2012)
  • 原作: Philip K. Dick
  • 主演: Colin Farrell、Bokeem Woodbine、Bryan Cranston、Kate Beckinsale
  • 别名: 拦截记忆码
  • 别名: 新宇宙威龙
  • 集数: 1
  • 开始: 2012-08-03
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 每集长: 118分钟
  • imdb_id: tt1386703
  • 导演: Len Wiseman
  • 编剧: Kurt Wimmer、Mark Bomback
